titleInfo.title: State of Tennessee vs Peter Blanton and Mary Jane Williams, Colored

subject.topic: Hagler, W.J.; Blanton, Peter; Williams, Mary Jane; Cooley, S.W.

mods.note: A court summons issued by Clerk W.J. Hagler to S.W. Cooley, Sheriff of Stewart County, TN. Cooley is ordered to have witnesses Nelson Williams, William Clark, and Henry Payne, "colored," personally appear before the Circuit Court in order to give evidence in the case of the State vs Peter Blanton and Mary Jane Williams. The charge of adultery was brought against Blanton and Williams for cohabitating. Hagler filled out the summons and signed it as witness.
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.
